Class GeoclipmapTerrain

    public class GeoclipmapTerrain
extends GameObject
    A terrain class that implements the Geoclipmapping algorithm

                         Loader loader,
                         GameObject cameraObject)
        Create a new terrain
        Parameters:
        material - The material to be used
        heightMap - The height map to be used
        textSize - The terrain radius
        detail - The amount of detail in the terrain
        levels - The number of levels of detail
        loader - The loader
        cameraObject - The camera
